General.Name: Digizuite AS
General.Description: Digizuite A/S develops and sells digital asset management software worldwide. The company offers Digizuite DAM that orchestrates data from various sources; Digizuite brand portals, which manage assets by brand or product line; Digizuite for Optimizely; Digizuite for Sitecore; and Digizuite for Adobe CC, which offers visual content creation and asset management. It also provides consultancy and support services; as well as engages in marketing activities. The company serves manufacturing, retail, life sciences, financial services, and professional services industries. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Odense, Denmark.
